level.heading: RENTAL HOUSING CASES – BEGINNING A CASE (ยง 1-2921)

level.text: 2921.1 A party may begin a rental housing case by filing a petition with theent Administrator in accordance with 14 DCMR ยง 3901.
2921.2 The timeliness of the filing of any petition shall be measured from theate the Rent Administrator accepts it for filing.
2921.3 The Rent Administrator may refuse to accept a petition for filing asrovided in14 DCMR ยง 3901.
2921.4 After filing, the Rent Administrator shall forward the petition and allccompanying papers to OAH, together with a copy of the registration statementor the housing accommodation.
2921.5 When OAH receives a petition from the Rent Administrator, OAH shall openhe case. The parties then shall file all papers and attachments at OAH inccordance with Section 2809.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674 (July 14, 2006); as amendedy Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12576 (December 31,010).
